title: Facebook
description: One of the largest social networking platforms where users can connect with friends, share content, and join communities. https://www.facebook.com

title: Instagram
description: A popular photo and video sharing app that allows users to capture and share moments through visual storytelling. https://www.instagram.com

title: Twitter
description: A microblogging platform where users post and interact with messages called 'tweets', engaging in real-time conversations. https://www.twitter.com

title: LinkedIn
description: A professional networking site where users can connect with colleagues, showcase their work experience, and grow their careers. https://www.linkedin.com

title: YouTube
description: A video-sharing platform where users can upload, view, share, and comment on videos across various categories. https://www.youtube.com
